amendment.description: Amendment requires the FTC and the Attorney General to conduct a study and report to Congress on the marketing practices of the firearms industry with respect to children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 33 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to commission a study of marketing practices of the firearms industry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
